decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Proposed plans, conservatory details (3 pages), Planning statement, Existing plans received on 28/04/2014, drawing no. HP 4321 ISSUE A (elevations) and location plan received on 13/05/2014 and block plan and front garden plan as amended received on 09/09/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The property shall not contain more than 7 residents (including caretaker/landlord) at any one time.

Condition : 4 - Full details of bin storage to be submitted and approved prior to commencement of works. The bin storage shall be implemented in accordance with the approved details prior to the commencement of the development and retained in that form for as long as the development remains in existence

Condition : 5 - No development shall take place until full details of both hard and soft landscape works have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority and these works shall be carried out as approved.  Hard landscaping works shall include car parking layouts and hard surfacing material. Soft landscape works shall include planting plans; schedules of plants, noting species, plant sizes and proposed numbers/densities where appropriate and implementation programme.
Condition : 6 - Prior to the commencement of development, the shed to rear garden of the site shall be demolished.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension, creation of 2 parking spaces, including dropping a kerb and the use of the existing house in multiple occupation (HMO) by no more than seven people).
